-- auto-generated definition
create table degree
(
    id          bigint auto_increment
        primary key,
    description varchar(255) not null,
    no          varchar(255) not null,
    remarks     varchar(255) null
);


-- auto-generated definition
create table department
(
    id          bigint auto_increment
        primary key,
    description varchar(255) not null,
    no          varchar(255) not null,
    remarks     varchar(255) null,
    school_id   int          not null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table
proTitle
(
    id          bigint auto_increment
        primary key,
    description varchar(255) not null,
    no          varchar(255) not null,
    remarks     varchar(255) null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table school
(
    id          bigint auto_increment
        primary key,
    description varchar(255) not null,
    no          varchar(255) not null,
    remarks     varchar(255) null,
    constraint no
        unique (no)
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table teacher
(
    id          bigint auto_increment
        primary key,
    description varchar(255) not null,
    no          varchar(255) not null,
    remarks     varchar(255) null
);
